channel.title: New User Button & Re-sizable - Project Insanity Client
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape,
This is my custom made 317 Project Insanity client I've made. I can't seem to find out how to make the New User button in the bellow picture instead of opening and displaying text to opening to a website page. Any help will be much appreciated.
[img]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/2781/clientnewuser.png[/img]
[hr]
I also want to make my Client so It can't be maximized. I want the maximize feature on the client window to be remove or It to be cahnged so when it's clicked it turns re-sizable. If anyone can assist in Making it re-sizable or removing the maximize button it will be much appreciated.
Thanks,
New Legacy.

item.title: New User Button & Re-sizable - Project Insanity Client
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

I did the frame thing and that worked.

But the Url thing I did and it keeps opening the link and doesn’t stop lagging the computer out. How do i make it display one then go back to the log-in?

Read full topic
item.source: New User Button & Re-sizable - Project Insanity Client

item.title: New User Button & Re-sizable - Project Insanity Client
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

For minimize button,
RSFrame class

frame.setResizeable(true); // Change to false

‘New User’ look under the ‘drawLoadingText’ void and change the action to ‘openUrl’ its a packet in the client. I’m not sure how to put into code atm, I’m at school, I forgot how the code would be used, I’ll get back to this later.

Read full topic
item.source: New User Button & Re-sizable - Project Insanity Client

item.description:
@A_New_LIght wrote:

You could look at galkons released client for the maximized part. Not sure where it would be located at though.

Read full topic
